name: Grok imagine Text to Video Generator Kie AI
description:
Generates video from a text prompt using the Grok Imagine model via the kie.ai API.
Pricing (as of November 2025):  $0.10 per 6-second video.
Get your API key at https://kie.ai
author: @@official.shinkai

api_key.description: Required API key for kie.ai API authentication

max_duration.description: Optional maximum duration in seconds to wait for task completion. Default: 300 (equal 5 minutes)

polling_interval.description: Optional interval in seconds for polling the task status (how often to check if video generation is complete). Default: 5

prompt.description: The text prompt describing the video to generate. Max length : 5000 characters.

filename.description: Optional filename for the saved video (without extension). Default: None (uses the task_id as filename)

local_path.description: The local file path where the video is saved

task_id.description: The task ID from the API
